item.title: Guns, Blood, Drugs, and Real Time Fighting all in a MMORPG
item.dc:creator: @kornthebldgd kornthebldgd
item.description:
@kornthebldgd wrote:

Ok im thinking about writing my own game engine, but i still do not know java as well as C++. If you could give me more reasons why Java is better than C++ I might change my mind. Also I am gonig to start a website that tracks the progress of my work, and will show you some of my past game models and the ones I am currentlly working on.
Thanks
Korn

Read full topic

item.title: Guns, Blood, Drugs, and Real Time Fighting all in a MMORPG
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

[quote=“Thabest, post:39, topic:47667”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=66558.msg775072#msg775072 date=1168842217]

If you put sex in there will be legal issues.

No you just need disclaimers.

And if you blur it out, there are no problems.

The concept of the game is pretty cool though. Like being a hitman, or dealing drugs, etc…
[/quote]

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hot_Coffee_mod[/quote]
Because it was hidden and given a 17+ rating when something like that should be 18+.
Reading is cool! Go join Jackal Thompson and company in a teaparty.

Read full topic

item.title: Guns, Blood, Drugs, and Real Time Fighting all in a MMORPG
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Thabest, post:39, topic:47667”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=66558.msg775072#msg775072 date=1168842217]

If you put sex in there will be legal issues.

No you just need disclaimers.

And if you blur it out, there are no problems.

The concept of the game is pretty cool though. Like being a hitman, or dealing drugs, etc…
[/quote]

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hot_Coffee_mod[/quote]
They didn’t have disclaimers, and they probably didn’t blur it out, which was my point in the first place -.- The game was advertised with a mature rating, but it should have been adult rated in the first place. That’s why they got in shit.

item.title: Guns, Blood, Drugs, and Real Time Fighting all in a MMORPG
item.dc:creator: @Thabest Thabest
item.description:
@Thabest wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:36, topic:47667”][quote author=Thabest link=topic=66558.msg775030#msg775030 date=1168841530]
If you put sex in there will be legal issues.
[/quote]
No you just need disclaimers.

And if you blur it out, there are no problems.

The concept of the game is pretty cool though. Like being a hitman, or dealing drugs, etc…[/quote]

en.wikipedia.org

Hot Coffee mod

Hot Coffee is a normally inaccessible mini-game in the 2004 video game Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas, developed by Rockstar North. Public awareness of the existence of the mini-game arrived with the release of the Hot Coffee mod, created for the Microsoft Windows port of GTA: San Andreas in 2005. This mod enables access to the mini-game. The mini-game portrays animated sexual intercourse between the main character, Carl "CJ" Johnson, and his chosen in-game girlfriend. The name of the mod is deri...

Read full topic

item.title: Guns, Blood, Drugs, and Real Time Fighting all in a MMORPG
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

[quote=“93dcthugs93, post:35, topic:47667”][quote author=moparisthebest link=topic=66558.msg774952#msg774952 date=1168839653]

Yeah don’t forget the sex god damnit. :eek:

Ok well it will be written in C++ because the way i plan on writing it involves C++, and you can also do alot of things in C++ that you can not do in Java.

If you want a job or not really a job, but some work, send me a sample of you work. My Email is Kansasskater@yahoo.com

Also shoot me an email if you have any questions, complaints or concerns. And yes suggestions are good too.

Thanks Korn

What can you do in C++ that can’t be done in Java?
[/quote]

Really?!

Write it in Java, Do you know Java? Java is better :)[/quote]

Java is basically C++ but slow as shit.

Read full topic
